title: In the Making
text: A page for process documentation and future projects in the making.

title: In the Making
text:
Future Projects






Important



The creative process isn’t linear. These ideas are always subject to change, but they serve as ideas I’m currently interested in or as inspiration for future commissions!



Fantasy character design (specifically for DND campaigns)
Canvas & acrylic pet portraits, especially of dogs
Hand-bleached t-shirt designs
“Shag” inspired, mid-modern digital art










A recent bleached t-shirt I made! (See the original fish skeleton sketch in the Gallery)

title: About the Artist
text:
COLORADO-BASED ARTIST / ILLUSTRATOR
I wish I could say that I’ve finely-tuned one medium, one mode of creating art — But that would be untrue to myself. I create wherever inspiration strikes, in whatever form I feel most drawn to. I primarily focus on illustration (both on paper and digitally), but dabble in sculpting, jewelry-making, painting, collage making, and photography. The joy of creating is in exploration, which is why I’m hesitant to tether myself to one medium.


Want to create together or commission a personalized art piece? Contact me at driftedform@gmail.com!

title: Gallery
text: Drawings, paintings, and objects exploring form, bone, and anything else the universe throws my way.

title: Gallery
text:
Illustrations
Skulls (and bones in general) have always been one of my favorite things to draw. Below is a boar skull, a fish skeleton, and a cat skull.

















I’ve also been working on designing some coloring book pages. Here are a few:





















Here’s where the theme of my art takes a turn. After one of the newest animated Spider-Man movies was released in theaters, I became obsessed with drawing new, original spider-person characters. The first two you see below are based on real spider species, while the third was a commission for a friend.


















Overgrown - (Graphite & colored pencil)






Multimedia Piece: Crayon, ink, graphite, & coloring pages






Through the Glass (Somewhat of a Self-Portrait)

title: Gallery
text:
Pet Portraits
Pet portraits are my main commission request.
